newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was active in the Panhandle area late Tuesday. Slaughter steers and heifers closed $2.00 higher.

Feedlots reported good inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 30,100 slaughter steers and 19,300 heifers; 68,900 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 54 loads or 1,800 head of CME cattle delivered to area packing plants, 15,600 formulated and 1,900 head previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Steers - select and choice 2-3 1075-1250 lbs 68.00 to mostly 69.00, few north plains 70.00. Pen select, few choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 67.00-68.50.
Heifers - select and choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 69.00, few north plains 69.50-70.00. Select, few choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs
Wk to date: 68,900 Week Ago: 91,900 Year Ago: 48,400
